name: CubyDodgyV2
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 107

Theme: Don't Touch It!

The goal of the game is simple, survive as long as you can while avoiding a number of obstacles. The longer you survive, the harder the game will get.

Plans for the future:

A boss is being worked on.

===================

  • 0.2 Update
  • Added Cursor
  • Added Linux build

===================

  • 1.0 Update
  • Fixed repeating sounds. Should only play one at a time
  • Tweaked Cuby's shot to be a bit more visible
  • Added game icon
